trans-unit.source: Represents a query against a specified table.
trans-unit.target: Represents a query against a specified table.

trans-unit.source: The <codeEntityReference>T:Microsoft.WindowsAzure.Storage.Table.TableQuery</codeEntityReference> class aggregates and encodes the query parameters to pass with the request when the query is executed.
trans-unit.target: The <codeEntityReference>T:Microsoft.WindowsAzure.Storage.Table.TableQuery</codeEntityReference> class aggregates and encodes the query parameters to pass with the request when the query is executed.

trans-unit.source: To execute the query, call the <codeInline>executeQuery</codeInline> or <codeInline>executeQuerySegmented</codeInline> method of the <codeEntityReference>T:Microsoft.WindowsAzure.Storage.Table.CloudTableClient</codeEntityReference> class.
trans-unit.target: To execute the query, call the <codeInline>executeQuery</codeInline> or <codeInline>executeQuerySegmented</codeInline> method of the <codeEntityReference>T:Microsoft.WindowsAzure.Storage.Table.CloudTableClient</codeEntityReference> class.
